text:
Minnesota Public Safety Commissioner John Harrington says they've begun contact tracing arrestees.

"Who are they associated with? What platforms are they advocating for? ... Is this organized crime? ... We are in the process right now of building that information network." https://t.co/U0KNIVHnf6
